titleInfo.title: National Council of Jewish Women Convention

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 7 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''#434, National Council of Jewish Women, donor Mrs. Rose Lorig from personal papers of Mildred Reibscherd, Regional Conference, Denver, March 1960.'' Stamped on back of photograph: ''Convention Photographers International, 1433 Tremont Place, Denver, Colo.''

mods.abstract: Three unidentified women pose together at the National Council of Jewish Women regional convention in Denver, Colorado.

name.namePart: National Council of Jewish Women.--Denver Section
